verses.roman:
ei chaya yogī sādhu-saṅgādi-hetu pāñā
kṛṣṇa bhaje kṛṣṇa-guṇe ākṛṣṭa hañā

synonyms: ei—this; chaya—six; yogī—mystics; sādhu—of devotees; saṅga-ādi—the association; hetu—because of; pāñā—getting; kṛṣṇa bhaje—render service to Kṛṣṇa; kṛṣṇa-guṇe—by the transcendental qualities of Kṛṣṇa; ākṛṣṭa—attracted; hañā—becoming.
translation: "When a purified yogī associates with devotees, he engages in Lord Kṛṣṇa's devotional service, being attracted by the Lord's transcendental qualities.
